Identify the prime factorization of \(5^{25} - 1\).
Use the formula for the difference of powers: \(a^n - b^n = (a - b)(a^{n-1} + a^{n-2}b + \ldots + ab^{n-2} + b^{n-1})\) to simplify \((5^{25})^5 - 1\).

Verify if \( (5^{125} - 1)/(5^{25} - 1) \) is a prime number or not based on the results of simplification and factorization.
